import React from "react"; import { OverlayTrigger, Tooltip } from "react-bootstrap"; import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { outlookFetchMeesage } from "../OutlookActions"; import { Moment, HtmlRender } from "../../../common/utils/components"; import Select2 from "../../../common/forms/inputs/Select2"; import Summernote from "../../../common/forms/editors/Summernote"; class OutlookReplay extends React.Component { state = { cc: false, bcc: false, attachments: false, sending: false }; currentMessage = null; componentDidMount() { if (this.currentMessage !== this.props.match.params.id) { this.props.dispatch(outlookFetchMeesage(this.props.match.params.id)); this.currentMessage = this.props.match.params.id; } } handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ sending: true }); setTimeout(() => { this.props.history.push("/outlook"); }, 1000); }; addCarbonCopy = e => { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ cc: true }); }; addBlindCarbonCopy = e => { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ bcc: true }); }; addAttachments = e => { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ attachments: true }); }; render() { const ccTrigger = !this.state.cc ? ( Carbon Copy} > CC ) : null; const bccTrigger = !this.state.bcc ? ( Blind Carbon Copy} > BCC ) : null; const message = this.props.message; return message.body ? (

) : null; } } export default withRouter(connect(state => state.outlook)(OutlookReplay));
